attributes.action: Sack North Wales Chief Constable. Mr Brunstrom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Chief Constable of North Wales Police should be sacked from his position becuase of his comments about 'legalising class A drugs' on the 15/October/2007.
This statement that the police are loosing the battle against drugs and it would be easier to legalise them makes the law abiding citizens of the UK ask 'what do we pay for a police force for ?'.
Mr Brunstrom would rather his force go after the easy target (the motorist), rather than do the real police work that the public in general want from his force.
This man even goes against the ACPO at every turn. Why should the people of North Wales pay this mans wages ?
The home office or whoever are his superiors should dismis this man ASAP.
Mr Brunstrom is harming the general publics oppinion of the British Police Force.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
